name: CARL (carl2dgame)
description:
SUMMARY

Take on the role of Carl, a white collar worker trying to live his best life. Choose your own path and make difficult choices. Will you obey the oppressive system and rise through the ranks? Or will you act against it for the good of the people?

GAMEPLAY

Navigate through the hierarchical society using a simple point-and-click interface.  Talk to NPCs, inspect objects and engage with the environment via a hidden item style camera puzzle. Receive missions and submit your report daily in order to secure the approval of your superiors. Alternatively, disobey your orders and lie in your reports to help the oppressed and uncover the hidden side of society. 

KEY FEATURES
  • A diverse cast of quirky characters to interact with
  • Rich environment with different zones to explore
  • Visual storytelling and show-not-tell gameplay
  • Branching storyline based on the choices you make
  • Unique and stylised art style
  • Hidden item style camera puzzle
  • Morality system that adds depth but does not penalise the player
  • Customizable home base 
  • Autosave at the end of each day
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

Extract the file

Open "CARL.exe" to play

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

A working pc

11GB hard disk space

OTHERS

Up to 2 hours of gameplay per route

If you click new game, all previous save data will be deleted so beware!
